issue.title: [CF 1485] Resource Display: Health. Possible to show absorbs ?
issue.body:
I have set up a bar to show my own health but it does not seem to show any absorbs. Is there any way to make it show the absorbs just like health bars usually show them?


> Posted by CurseForge user meltra67566 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1485 | Raw
